articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: Russia ‘Overthrows’ Saudi Arabia As China’s Leading Oil Supplier; Beijing, Delhi Buy Moscow’s Cheap Oil - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Russia successfully surpassed Saudi Arabia to claim the position of China's top crude oil supplier in 2023, according to recent data.
articles.content:
In a noteworthy development reported on Jan 20, Russia surpassed Saudi Arabia to emerge as China’s top crude oil supplier in 2023, according to recent data. 
Even with Russia experiencing sanctions … [+4604 chars]
